templates.formattingInstruction: Which TWO warnings does Dan give about picking mushrooms?

questionBlock.question: Which TWO warnings does Dan give about picking mushrooms?

options.text: Don't pick more than one variety of mushroom at a time.
Don't pick mushrooms near busy roads.
Don't eat mushrooms given to you.
Don't eat mushrooms while picking them.
Don't pick old mushrooms.

questionBlock.question: Which TWO warnings does Dan give about picking mushrooms?

options.text: Don't pick more than one variety of mushroom at a time.
Don't pick mushrooms near busy roads.
Don't eat mushrooms given to you.
Don't eat mushrooms while picking them.
Don't pick old mushrooms.

templates.formattingInstruction: Which TWO ideas about wild mushrooms does Dan say are correct?

questionBlock.question: Which TWO ideas about wild mushrooms does Dan say are correct?

options.text: Mushrooms should always be peeled before eating.
Mushrooms eaten by animals may be unsafe.
Cooking destroys toxins in mushrooms.
Brightly coloured mushrooms can be edible.
All poisonous mushrooms have a bad smell.

questionBlock.question: Which TWO ideas about wild mushrooms does Dan say are correct?

options.text: Mushrooms should always be peeled before eating.
Mushrooms eaten by animals may be unsafe.
Cooking destroys toxins in mushrooms.
Brightly coloured mushrooms can be edible.
All poisonous mushrooms have a bad smell.

templates.introInstruction:
Questions 15-20
Choose the correct letter, A, B or C.

questionBlock.question: What advice does Dan give about picking mushrooms in parks?

options.text: Choose wooded areas.
Don't disturb wildlife.
Get there early.

questionBlock.question: Dan says it is a good idea for beginners to

options.text: use a mushroom app.
join a group.
take a reference book.

questionBlock.question: What does Dan say is important for conservation?

options.text: selecting only fully grown mushrooms
picking a limited amount of mushrooms
avoiding areas where rare mushroom species grow

questionBlock.question: According to Dan, some varieties of wild mushrooms are in decline because there is

options.text: a huge demand for them from restaurants.
a lack of rain in this part of the country.
a rise in building developments locally.

questionBlock.question: Dan says that when storing mushrooms, people should

options.text: keep them in the fridge for no more than two days.
keep them in a brown bag in a dark room.
leave them for a period after washing them.

questionBlock.question: What does Dan say about trying new varieties of mushrooms?

options.text: Experiment with different recipes.
Expect some to have a strong taste.
Cook them for a long time.
